participant_1.background:
I began whittling and traveling the country in my car.
i live in the great white north.
if i can t order it on the internet , i don t need it.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.
my family is very supportive of my skiing.

participant_2.background:
On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father.
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
my favorite show is thevoice.
I do not care too much about my appearance because I am more interested in making friends and having fun.
My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.

content.text: Hi there! What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to bake, especially cupcakes! What about you?
I love to play the piano, it is a great way to relax and clear my mind.
Oh that's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument, but I have no musical talent.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing when I was in high school.
Maybe I'll look into it, I could always use a new hobby.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! I'm really into whittling, I started when I was traveling the country in my car.
That sounds really cool! I've never heard of whittling before.
It's basically carving wood, it's a lot of fun and you can make some really cool things.
That's awesome! I'll have to look into it, it sounds like something I'd enjoy.
You should, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new things to try.
